input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: HOCH HEALTH EASTERN SWITZERLAND. Summary: Window Cleaning. Description: HOCH Health Ostschweiz (hereinafter HOCH) plans to outsource window cleaning to external service providers in order to ensure the long-term preservation of the value of its buildings. This tender originally concerns five locations, including the St. Gallen Cantonal Hospital and the hospitals in Grabs, Linth, Altstatten and Wil.<br> The framework agreements have a fixed term of three years with the possibility of extension for one year at a time, but for a maximum of two years in total.<br> Note: Lot 11 (Altstatten Hospital) will not be continued. Due to the definitive closure of the Altstatten Hospital, this lot is no longer applicable and the tender will be canceled accordingly (according to Art. 43 Para. 1 lit. a IVoeB).<br> The remaining lots (1-10) are not affected by this partial demolition and remain part of the tender.<br> All Interested providers have already been informed directly about the loss of the lot and the cancellation of the planned viewing on October 30, 2025.<br> St.Gallen location<br> Cleaning of windows, interior glazing and blinds according to the service description (in the documents)<br> Grabs location<br> Uznach location<br> Location Wil<br> Altstatten location<br> Doc Title: Window cleaning<br> Contract Type: services. Published Date: 2025-11-03. Closing Date: 2025-12-05. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: STATE SECRETARIAT FOR ECONOMIC AFFAIRS (SECO). Summary: Resilient and Efficient Utilities in North Macedonia. Description: The project's main goal is to boost the resilience and efficiency of urban water and wastewater Utilities in North Macedonia and thereby contribute to the cities- economic development. To achieve this, the project aims to improve the organizations, operational and financial performance of seven Public Utilities while increasing their energy efficiency and expanding the use of renewable energy. Key supporting factors for success include the gradual upgrade of Utility infrastructure, as well as the integration of energy efficiency aspects in the regulatory and institutional framework. An Implementation Consultant will assist the Utilities with corporate development support to improve their business planning, reduce non-revenue water, adopt energy efficiency approaches for water and wastewater services, and implement renewable energy measures. Through the increased energy efficiency and a sound business planning, the project contributes to the sustainability of infrastructure investments which is a pre-requisite for economic development and to climate mitigation. On national level, the IC will support the Regulator to strengthen its capacities in the supervision of the Utilities- investment planning, energy audits and tariff structures. Find further information in the documentation. <br> Doc Title: Resilient and Efficient Utilities in North Macedonia <br> Contract Type: services. Published Date: 2025-09-30. Closing Date: 2025-11-16. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: State Secretariat for Economic Affairs (SECO)

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR THE ENVIRONMENT BAFU, AIR POLLUTION CONTROL DEPARTMENT AND CHEMICALS. Summary: Documentation Site Air Pollution and Health (Ludok 2026+). Description: The Environmental Protection Act (USG) obliges the Federal Council to determine immission limit values (IGW) to assess harmful or annoying effects due to air pollution (Art. 13 USG). The law contains a binding catalog of criteria on how to set IGW. Based At the status of science or experience, IGW, among other things, must be determined in such a way that immissions below these values do not endanger people, animals and plants and do not significantly disturb the population in their well -being (Art. 13 and 14 USG). If there is no IGW for a pollutant, The immissions are considered excessive if they endanger people, animals and plants and significantly disrupt the population in their well -being (Art. 2 Para. 5 LRV). The authority must assess whether the determined immissions are excessive (Art. 30 LRV).<br> The BAFU - as the environmental authority of the federal government - has the task of pursuing the progressive state of scientific knowledge of the health effects of air pollutants, evaluating immissions, informing the population and, if necessary, an application for an adaptation of the immission limit values of the To provide air pollution regulation (LRV). The examination of the effects of air pollutants on the health of the population is a priority issue in the research concept 2025-2028 of the BAFU (focus II-immission protection, research area 8 air, priority research issues: Bew .... Published Date: 2025-08-07. Closing Date: 2025-09-25. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR THE ENVIRONMENT BAFU, DIRECTORATE AREA CLIMATE. Summary: Climate Test for Financial Institutions 2026-2027 with a Focus of Real Estate and Mortgages. Description: The KLV Climate Protection Ordinance stipulates that the Federal Office for the Environment BAFU is carrying out a voluntary climate test for the Swiss financial market at least every two years. With the regular climate test, the federal government is intended to state the climate -compatible orientation of the financial means flows, the progress and remaining challenges can determine. A review should also be possible where and how the Swiss financial market makes an effective climate contribution. The KLV came into force on 01.01.2025. The BAFU has already gained experience with such climate test. There are different ones for that Test modules developed and continuously developed. The climate test currently consists of three modules:<br> - Real estate/mortgage module (quantitative)<br> - stocks/corporate bond module (quantitative)<br> - Questionnaire on climate -relevant strategies and measures (qualitative)<br> A next test round is for 2026 planned. Above all, the tender includes the preparation and application of the Immobilien/Hypothek module. The further development and application of the module stock and corporate bonds is not the subject of the present order. The qualitative questionnaire is in terms of content by the BAFU further developed and adapted to the current federal needs. However, close coordination during the project with all modules will be important. On behalf of the BAFU, an additional module for benefits in biodiversity in global investments is currently ent.... Published Date: 2025-08-07. Closing Date: 2025-09-26. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: GENEVA AIRPORT. Summary: Insonorisation Program - Pollutant Design / Diagnostic Offices / Acoustic Diagnostic. Description: The market concerns the service of design offices (assistance), polluting diagnostics as well as acoustic diagnostics to be issued within the framework of the soundproofing program set up by Geneva Airport for the benefit of residents of the airport platform.<br> The market is divided into 3 Distinct lots, which can be awarded to several contractors.<br> Design offices<br> As part of the soundproofing program, the agents of lot 1 support GA in the implementation of the soundproofing program by applying established processes, coordinating the steps with Owners, by piloting diagnostics in collaboration with the agents of lots 2 and 3, etc.<br> Polluting diagnostic<br> As part of the soundproofing program, Lot 2 representatives carry out at the request of GA and/or the agents of lot 1 the samples and analyzes required In terms of pollutants (asbestos, lead, PCB, etc.)<br> Acoustic diagnostic<br> As part of the soundproofing program, the agents of Lot 3 carry out at the request of GA and/or the agents of Lot 1 the necessary acoustic analyzes.<br> Doc Title: soundproofing program - design offices / Pollutant diagnosis / acoustic diagnostic<br> Type contract: Services. Published Date: 2025-07-24. Closing Date: 2025-09-03. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: The Nature Conservation (FNS) department is the body in the canton of Zurich responsible for the execution of nature conservation legislation. This includes long -term preservation and promotion of particularly endangered types of flora. For this purpose, a "Action Plan Flora" was developed as a long -term program. As part of theAction plan Flora is designated which species should be preserved and promoted in the long term with special measures. A species -specific action plan was or is developed for each of these species. The measures derived from this are given by the species responsible for this orderplanned and implemented. Description: Based on Article 35 of the CO2 Act of December 23, 2011 (SR 641.71) and the associated execution provisions (Art. 114 to 118 of the CO2 regulation of November 30, 2012, SR 641.711), the federal government can guarantee the maximum amount of CHF 3 million to companies in whole or in part,develop and market the new technologies to reduce greenhouse gas emissions, to promote the use of renewable energies and to protect natural resources. These companies receive an assurance if the assessment is positive. The guarantee becomes banks or othersgranted suitable loans. Since the start of the technology fund in 2015, a total of 212 guarantees have been issued by the end of 2024. <br> The operational continuation of the technology fund should be outsourced as before to an external office. This checks the applications both in terms ofits technological suitability as well as the financial structure and load -bearing capacity of the company. It ensures equal treatment and traceability of the decisions to the approval of the different applicants. Then she manages the guaranteesAnd accompanies the loan persons on behalf of the federal government. To do this, you have a comprehensive information system and ensures meaningful reporting and risk management. It also markets the range of technology funds for stimulating practical requests. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: PINI GROUP AG. Summary: Reservoir Headwood - Fittings and Pipes. Description: The municipalities of Rueschlikon and Kilchberg operate several reservoir systems in the headwood area for the supply of their upper pressure zones. Both communities are members of the simple company HTRK, which processed spring water from the Rothenturm area and to the partner communities of Horgen, Thalwil(Distributed in the Horgen) and Rueschlikon, Kilchberg (headwood in the sublop). These systems, including supply and derivations, come from 1907 and 1927 and have long since exceeded the expected useful life. At the same point, the Zweckverband Seewasserwerk Trkl has oneOwn reservoir system, which provides the participating communities of Thalwil, Rueschlikon, Kilchberg, Langnau and the municipality of Adliswil. The parties involved would like to extensively renew the existing systems and use each other as many synergies as possible. As part of theConcept phase were coordinated with the concerns and needs of all four clients (municipalities of Rueschlikon and Kilchberg, water supply HTRK, sea water plant Trkl) and presented in a joint system concept. The replacement new buildings should be placed in place of the existing systemsand as a common building complex with separate areas of responsibility are realized in stages. <br> Main CPV: 41000000 raw water and preparedWater. Published Date: 2025-04-29. Closing Date: 2025-05-27. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: STATE SECRETARIAT OF ECONOMIC AFFAIRS (SECO). Summary: Vietnam Swiss Urban Development Programme. Description: The Vietnam Swiss Urban Development Programme - developed carefully and in close collaboration with UDA - will be the SECO-s infrastructure financing divisions bilateral flagship project in Vietnam to strengthen urban development planning and urban climate resilience and support necessary reforms to a more integrated urban development approach in Vietnam. It will assist the Ministry of Construction (MoC) in facilitating the implementation of urban planning policies and programs, support innovative solutions to strengthen urban climate resilience and sustainable urban planning and management, and provide strategic advice on critical priorities on urban development. Support also aims at assisting cities in integrating and anticipating climate change risks in their urban development plans and strengthening disaster risk prevention by testing innovative solutions for urban flood risk reduction. <br> Doc Title: Vietnam Swiss Urban Development Programme <br> Contract Type: services. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR THE ENVIRONMENT BAFU, AIR POLLUTION DEPARTMENT AND CHEMICALS, AIR QUALITY SECTION, MONBIJOUSTRASSE 40, CH-3003 BERN. Summary: Moos Biomonitoring 2025 to Estimate the Deposition of Air Pollutants Federal Office for the Environment Bafu, Department of Air Pollution and Chemicals, Air Quality Section. Description: MOOS Biomonitoring 2025 To estimate the deposition of air pollutants: To monitor the deposition of heavy metals and other pollutants entered via atmospheric deposition, a Europe -wide organic monitoring based on mosses is regularly carried out as part of the Air Course (Geneva Run Convention). Switzerland has been participating in this investigation every 5 years since 1990. D goals of the 2025 survey are:- Quantitative determination of the content of (heavy) metals, nitrogen, nitrogen as well as selected PAK and PCB in mosses of representative source. Temporary development of deposition values ​​since 1990 with regard to the success of success of realized emission reductions.. Currency: CHF. Published Date: 2024-06-04. Closing Date: 2024-07-24. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR THE ENVIRONMENT BAFU, AIR POLLUTION DEPARTMENT AND CHEMICALS, AIR QUALITY SECTION, MONBIJOUSTRASSE 40, CH-3003 BERN
output.Summary: Moos Biomonitoring 2025 to Estimate the Deposition of Air Pollutants Federal Office for the Environment Bafu, Department of Air Pollution and Chemicals, Air Quality Section
output.Description: MOOS Biomonitoring 2025 To estimate the deposition of air pollutants: To monitor the deposition of heavy metals and other pollutants entered via atmospheric deposition, a Europe -wide organic monitoring based on mosses is regularly carried out as part of the Air Course (Geneva Run Convention). Switzerland has been participating in this investigation every 5 years since 1990. D goals of the 2025 survey are:- Quantitative determination of the content of (heavy) metals, nitrogen, nitrogen as well as selected PAK and PCB in mosses of representative source. Temporary development of deposition values ​​since 1990 with regard to the success of success of realized emission reductions.

instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE OF THE OFEF ENVIRONMENT, AIR PROTECTION AND CHEMICALS DIVISION, AIR QUALITY SECTION, MONBIJOUSTRAS 40, CH-3003 BERN. Summary: Monitoring Atmospheric Pollutants by Analysis of Foam 2025 Federal Office of the Ofev Environment, Division Air Protection and Chemicals, Air Quality Section. Description: Monitoring atmospheric pollutants by analysis of foam 2025: as part of a monitoring of heavy metal deposits and other pollutants by atmospheric spin -off provided by the Convention of the United Nations Economic Commission for Europe on pollution Long -distance cross -border atmospheric (CLRTAP), an analysis of mosses is regularly carried out on a European scale. Switzerland has been taking part in this research every five years since 1990. The objectives of the 2025 analyzes are as follows:- the determination, quantitatively, the metal (heavy), nitrogen levels and certain HAP and PCB of selected mosses selected On representative sites (places far from the sources of these pollutants);- coherent monitoring of the evolution of deposit values ​​since 1990 in order to control the results of the emission reductions carried out.. Published Date: 2024-06-04. Closing Date: 2024-07-24. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: FEDERAL OFFICE OF THE OFEF ENVIRONMENT, AIR PROTECTION AND CHEMICALS DIVISION, AIR QUALITY SECTION, MONBIJOUSTRAS 40, CH-3003 BERN
output.Summary: Monitoring Atmospheric Pollutants by Analysis of Foam 2025 Federal Office of the Ofev Environment, Division Air Protection and Chemicals, Air Quality Section
output.Description: Monitoring atmospheric pollutants by analysis of foam 2025: as part of a monitoring of heavy metal deposits and other pollutants by atmospheric spin -off provided by the Convention of the United Nations Economic Commission for Europe on pollution Long -distance cross -border atmospheric (CLRTAP), an analysis of mosses is regularly carried out on a European scale. Switzerland has been taking part in this research every five years since 1990. The objectives of the 2025 analyzes are as follows:- the determination, quantitatively, the metal (heavy), nitrogen levels and certain HAP and PCB of selected mosses selected On representative sites (places far from the sources of these pollutants);- coherent monitoring of the evolution of deposit values ​​since 1990 in order to control the results of the emission reductions carried out.

Summary: (b24019) Integal Operator Services Training Center Bazg Interlaken Federal Office for Buildings and Logistics Bbl, Object Management Department. Description: The present WTO advertisement is the former airfield area in Interlaken, which has been managed by the Federal Office for Buildings and Logistics (BBL) since January 1, 2020. The area and the associated objects are used for training and training purposes by the Federal Office of customs and border security (BAZG). There are also regular private tenants on the area who can rent and lease small objects and the surrounding area. In addition, major events such as the Greenfield or Trucker Festival take place annually. The tender includes four performance areas: A (object management/technical building management/house maintenance), B (environmental care/outside cleaning/winter service), C (cleaning) and D (event management). In order to continue to ensure operation from January 1, 2025, the services will be obtained externally via this WTO advertisement.. Currency: CHF. Published Date: 2024-05-29. instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: OFFICE FOR LANDSCAPE AND NATURE KT. ZURICH, NATURE CONSERVATION DEPARTMENT. Summary: Submission Area Support of over -communal Nature Conservation Objects, Gbt No. 4 Rafzerfeld Office for Landscape and Nature Kt. Zurich, Nature Conservation Department. Description: The "Fachstelle Natorschutz (FNS)" is the competent authority in the canton of Zurich for the application of the legislation on the protection of nature for all the objects of protection of the supracommunal nature. He takes care of the conservation of housing and species threatened and protected of supracommunal importance. For this, it is necessary to ensure management in accordance with objectives, guide visitors and take many maintenance measures to preserve the function of vegetation elements, constructions and infrastructure. For these various tasks, the FNS uses external specialists. The purpose of this call for tenders aims to award the mandate for managing nature protection objects in zone 4 RAFZERFELD. A detailed description of the tasks can be viewed in tender documents.. Published Date: 2024-05-01. Closing Date: 2024-06-12. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: UNIL - UNIVERSITY OF LAUSANNE. Summary: University of Lausanne - Cleaning of Banal Industrial Waste and Unibat Glass - Building and Works Service. Description: Insunning industrial waste (DIB): Turned by containers of approximately 800 liters, according to a bihebdomedary frequency (every Tuesday and Friday). input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: INHABITANTS ZUCHWIL. Summary: Suomission Gestion of the Déchet Zuchwil Municipality of Zuchwil Department of Construction and Planning. Description: Realization of door-to-door collections: household waste and bulky waste, green waste (with food remains), paper, cardboard as well as cardboard collection with industrial and craft businesses. The place of unloading of household waste is Kebag in Zuchwil and that of green waste Kompoogas in Utzenstorf. The responsibility of the compacting container for the cardboard (“Bauamt” collection point) as well as the valuation of the paper and the cardboard collected (for All the collections mentioned) are also part of it. The places of valuation of paper and cardboard can be chosen freely. The complexity of the mission lies in the fact that there are many collections spread over a year and that a corresponding vehicle park is necessary. The paper and cardboard collection volumes are down and there may be a certain transfer from cardboard collection to the "Bauamt".. Published Date: 2024-04-06. Closing Date: 2024-05-21. output.Summary: Suomission Gestion of the Déchet Zuchwil Municipality of Zuchwil Department of Construction and Planning
output.Description: Realization of door-to-door collections: household waste and bulky waste, green waste (with food remains), paper, cardboard as well as cardboard collection with industrial and craft businesses. The place of unloading of household waste is Kebag in Zuchwil and that of green waste Kompoogas in Utzenstorf. The responsibility of the compacting container for the cardboard (“Bauamt” collection point) as well as the valuation of the paper and the cardboard collected (for All the collections mentioned) are also part of it. The places of valuation of paper and cardboard can be chosen freely. The complexity of the mission lies in the fact that there are many collections spread over a year and that a corresponding vehicle park is necessary. The paper and cardboard collection volumes are down and there may be a certain transfer from cardboard collection to the "Bauamt".

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: HEAD OF WORK AND HOME SERVICE. Summary: Collection and Recycling Green Goods with Food Residues of Households in the Municipality of Niederlenz. Description: Implementation of the collection of Grüngut (cooked with food) from households in the Niederlenz municipal area and the recycling of the collected greenery. The place of exploitation is freely selectable and can take place in a composting or in a fermentation system. The green goods collections must be carried out with a sweeping press vehicle (rear loader), which has a comb fill and weighing. The provider is compensated for the collections with a price model by weight (CHF/kilogram) by the causative households. That is, that the provider immediately takes into account the households. This situation will come into force on January 1, 2025 (prerequisite for acceptance of new waste regulations). The greenery collection is currently being financed through the basic fee. Collection & exploitation of green goods with food residues of households in the municipality of Niederlenz <br> Doc Title: Collection & Users of Grüngut With Spiser Remests of Households in the municipality of Niederlenz <br> Contract type: services. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: NIEDERLENZ COMMUNITY. Summary: Collcete It Volrisation This Departure Represents This Malany Sur Liabitory the La Community the Niereline Law-derd Pet. Description: Realization of the collection of green waste (including the remains of cooked meals) of households on the territory of the municipality of Niederlenz and valuation of green waste collected. The valuation place is freely chosen and can be done in a composting or methanization installation. Green waste collection must be carried out using a garbage compacting vehicle (rear charger) with a comb and weighing collection system. The service provider is paid for collections by a weight model (CHF/kg) by households. The service provider invoices directly to households. This situation will come into force on January 1, 2025 (provided that the new regulation on waste is adopted). Currently, green waste collection is funded by the basic tax.. Published Date: 2024-03-21. Closing Date: 2024-05-04. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Collcete It Volrisation This Departure Represents This Malany Sur Liabitory the La Community the Niereline Law-derd Pet
output.Description: Realization of the collection of green waste (including the remains of cooked meals) of households on the territory of the municipality of Niederlenz and valuation of green waste collected. The valuation place is freely chosen and can be done in a composting or methanization installation. Green waste collection must be carried out using a garbage compacting vehicle (rear charger) with a comb and weighing collection system. The service provider is paid for collections by a weight model (CHF/kg) by households. The service provider invoices directly to households. This situation will come into force on January 1, 2025 (provided that the new regulation on waste is adopted). Currently, green waste collection is funded by the basic tax.

In the same area, various infrastructure projects are planned to be coordinated in the context of an overall project. As a main project, the existing drinking water pipe, which runs in parallel to the most utter track along the Berm, is renewed. Drinking water pipe created. In the framework of the sub-project of the track field lighting, the foundations for the future candelaber and a cable duct next to the most extreme track are created. Rhine side are created as part of the Safety fence sub-project and the future track goal, as well as an empty pipe system along the Berm .. Published Date: 2024-03-14. Closing Date: 2024-04-23. In the same area, various infrastructure projects are planned to be coordinated in the context of an overall project. As a main project, the existing drinking water pipe, which runs in parallel to the most utter track along the Berm, is renewed. Drinking water pipe created. In the framework of the sub-project of the track field lighting, the foundations for the future candelaber and a cable duct next to the most extreme track are created. Rhine side are created as part of the Safety fence sub-project and the future track goal, as well as an empty pipe system along the Berm .

Description: The Nature Conservation Agency (Fns) is the authority responsible in the canton of Zurich for enforcing nature conservation legislation for all supra-municipal nature conservation objects. It cares about the preservation of supra-communally important endangered and protected habitats and species. There is a target compliant for thisManagement and visitor guidance as well as the initiation of numerous maintenance measures are necessary for the functional maintenance of vegetation elements, structures and infrastructure facilities. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE OF CONSTRUCTIONS AND LOGISTICS OFCL. Summary: (B24000) Maintenance Cleaning and Specialized Cleaning, Campus Liebefeld<br> Federal Office for Buildings and Logistics Ofcl, Cleaning. Description: The Federal Office of Construction and Logistics (Ofcl) makes buildings and workstations available to staff of the Federal Civil Administration. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: CITY OF ZURICH DISPOSAL + RECYCLING ZURICH. Summary: Transport and Elimination in Accordance with the Law of Materials for Collecting Entsorgung + Recycling Zürich Entwässerg. Description: Over 100 km of small rivers flow on the territory of the city of Zurich. The sediments from the watershed are retained in approximately 130 sediment collectors. The largest collectors are emptied by external companies which directly evacuate the charding materials withdrawn and eliminate them in accordance with the law (recycling or discharge). Small alluvial collectors are emptied by Entsorgung + Recycling Zürich and collaborators The alluvial materials taken are provisionally stored in a deposit square. The alluvial materials stored temporarily must be evacuated from time to time by a third and eliminated company (recycled or discharged) in accordance with the law. The emptying, transport and elimination works are triggered by ERZ in the frames of orders Individual.. Published Date: 2024-01-26. Closing Date: 2024-02-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: OFFICE FOR LAND AND BUILDINGS (AGG). Summary: Procurement of Infrastructural Services - Framework Contracts. Description: The Canton of Bern is looking for several framework contract partners for the provision of infrastructural services (building cleaning, caretaker and house services as well as green maintenance) for the administrative regions of Bern-Mittelland including the city of Bern. The total potential is around 200,000 square metersers (mainly office buildings), plus school facilities. A framework agreement will be concluded with a maximum of 4 companies. The individual services are generally provided decentrally, i.e. directly, by the organizational units of the administration of the Canton of Bern or those responsible for public tasksitself, whereby the order is usually placed using a so-called mini-tender procedure (we reserve the right to place the order directly).
